Text.Language: Arip~recbeuin e~h~r/i e~jwn: niou/b n~te ]meym/i: pijout f~tou m~p~recbuteroc: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Intercede on our behalf, the priests of the Truth, the twenty-four presbyters, that He may forgive us our sins.
